Confounding Luck

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Halfling, second chance power, must worship Avandra
Benefit: When you use your second chance racial power and the triggering enemy’s attack misses, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 70.
